statements: DELETE FROM user_interactions_and_feedback WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND interaction_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_interactions_and_feedback WHERE user_id = 100 AND interaction_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM user_interactions_and_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%negative%' AND interaction_type = 'rating';
DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 101 AND interaction_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM ar_brand_experiences WHERE rating < 3 AND feedback IS NULL;

DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 AND action_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 123 AND feedback_timestamp <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date < '2022-01-01' AND user_id = 'e639b4ad-87d2-4b14-a9c4-0c4f5c046367';
